Now their attention is focused on a six-stand woolshed. Sun, 16 Jun 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Smedley cadets cut and milled the pine, tōtara and redwood timber used to build the education hub.

Major study: What scientists just learned about bird flu in NZ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/major-study-what-scientists-just-learned-about-bird-flu-in-nz/2BQLLYFPIBGVTBBGD5ZLKNBDOI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/major-study-what-scientists-just-learned-about-bird-flu-in-nz/2BQLLYFPIBGVTBBGD5ZLKNBDOI/ Jamie MortonTesting of nearly 20,000 wild birds has told us more about avian flu's risk to NZ. Sun, 16 Jun 2024 17:00:00 +0000 When researchers analysed 16 years of Ministry for Primary Industries sampling, covering some 19,000 wild birds, they found the key carriers of avian flu within New Zealand weren’t migrating seabirds, but mallard ducks.
